roleset.name: to defeat
roleset.note: SUBDUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'subdue' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from subdue.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result , he reignited the inflation that Mrs. Thatcher , through a long and costly effort , had subdued [*T*-1] .
example.arg: through a long and costly effort
